title: Diseases of the soule a discourse diuine, morall, and physicall. By Tho. Adams.
author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.
publisher: Printed by George Purslowe for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at the great south-dore of Paules, and at Brittaines Bursse,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
